name: Calturin and Clone
description: Calturin and Clone is a 2D co-op action RPG where you can either play as a lone adventurer or with a fellow wizard. Mainly focused on difficult boss fights and other challenging encounters that are not combat, Calturin and Clone will test you and your friend's skills to the limit. You and your ally play two mages that enter through a series of portals where you must defeat whatever the portals bring.
